nodes.text: Cathan Dru was a male Neimoidian working for the reconstituted Sith Empire on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He hired a mercenary Arak Malkan and his men to break into the vault guarded by Revaak, but after they returned empty-handed, was forced to turn to a passing Imperial for help.
